content.title: Proximal vs Distal DVT
content.definition: Proximal DVT (popliteal or above) has higher PE risk and requires treatment. Distal DVT management is controversial.
content.statement: Proximal vs Distal DVT is a fundamental concept in Health-Sciences Medicine Surgery Vascular Pathology Dvt that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics and clinical/practical applications.

explanation.intuition: Understanding Proximal vs Distal DVT helps build foundational knowledge. The concept connects to broader principles in the field.
explanation.key_insight: The key aspects of Proximal vs Distal DVT include core principles, common applications, and integration with related concepts.
explanation.technical_details: Technical details involve specific mechanisms, measurements, and evidence-based applications of Proximal vs Distal DVT.

clinical_pearls: Key point about Proximal vs Distal DVT
